attributes.action: Ensure the PM answers the questions that are put to him at PMQ's
attributes.additional_details:
The PM does not always provide answers to questions he is asked by the ladder of the opposition or ministers. I feel that the public have the right to have the answers to questions the PM is asked.
Questions are asked for a reason and I feel we are entitled to have true answers.
The speaker of the house and parliament should ensure questions are answered not avoided.
attributes.background:
At PMQ's the PM does not provide answers to questions from the opposition or ministers.
This should not be allowed to happen as the people want to hear clear answers to questions put to him.
Avoiding the question is not an answer. Parliament should ensure that the questions are answered

rejection.details:
It's not clear what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take to ensure that the Prime Minister answers questions in the way you describe.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/118388

Or you could start a new petition if you would like a different way of doing this.
